name: Noble Knight's Spearholder
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Level 8 or lower monster you control; until the End Phase, its name becomes "Fleur Synchron", also it is treated as a Tuner. You can Tribute this card; add 1 Equip Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Noble Knight's Spearholder" once per turn.
